name: Escape (itch) (ferrybridgegamestudio)
description:
Escape is a Platform Shooter Game made for Mix and Game Jam 2020.

A Platform Shooter Game made for Mix and Game Jam 2020.

The Jams's theme was mix genres and we mixed Platforming and Shooting with a twist! Your gun doesn't fire bullets to kill enemies but can destroy or create platforms. Use your fancy gun to work your way through single screen puzzle levels!

Controls

Jump: W, Space Bar or Second Mouse Button.

Move: A/D or Arrow Keys.

Shoot: Mouse Button.

Change Fire Mode: Tab.

Reset Level: R.

Return to Menu: Escape.
